form.section: Summary / Thank you in advance
form.label: Summary / Thank you in advance
form.content:
Thank you for your trust and your confidence.

To define the Investor Profile that is best suited to you, it is important for us to understand your personal and financial situation, your knowledge and experience of financial instruments, your investment objectives, and your risk tolerance.

Knowing you better means that we can advise you better. We therefore recommend that you respond to this questionnaire, which also meets the requirements of the applicable regulation. One of the objectives of which is to increase protection for savers and investors. The national authorities have also reinforced this mechanism by emphasizing that customer insight information (portfolio composition, cash, availability and indicative value of their assets, financial expenses) should be collected with the customer’s interests in mind, in order to provide them with a suitable, appropriate investment service.

Please keep us informed of any changes to your situation, knowledge and experience of financial instruments and your investment objectives, which may change your financial approach (risk/return).

We thank you in advance for taking the time to complete this document.Thank you for your trust and your confidence.

form.section: T&C Consent
form.label: Terms and conditions
form.content:
Be vigilant: updating the page will result in the return to the first page of the questionnaire. Your data will be lost and you will have to start the questionnaire again from the beginning.

Personal Data

CA Indosuez designs and provides investment solutions adapted to its clients’ profile. In order to be able to provide you with adapted or appropriate investment services, we would like to know more about your personal and wealth situation, knowledge and experience of financial instruments, your expectations, your appetite for risk and your investment objectives. This information will be used to define an appropriate investment strategy and support you in this regard.

Your consent may be changed or withdrawn at any time by updating your profile.

Your personal data is strictly confidential, and may not, without exemption or written agreement on your part, be exchanged or transferred outside the Indosuez entity to you are attached. As a client, your personal data will be retained for a duration of ten years from the end of your relationship with CA Indosuez. As a potential client, your personal data will be retained for a duration of three years from your last activity.

In accordance with the regulations on personal data protection, you may exercise your rights (access, correction, restriction, deletion and portability) and define the fate of your personal data by e-mail (dpo@ca-indosuez.fr) or by letter (CA Indosuez, DPO 17 rue du Docteur Lancereaux 75008 PARIS).

For more information, you can consult the section dedicated to personal data on our website.

form.section: Your investment objectives and your risk tolerance
form.content: Please indicate here the investment objectives you hope to achieve by entrusting us with the management of your assets through our investment advisory and/or portfolio management services. In a second time, these objectives will help determine the investment strategy used for each of these services. This excludes assets for which our role is limited to carrying out your instructions (Receiving/Sending orders (RTO)).

form.section: What is the main financial objective in entrusting your capital to us?
What is your investment horizon?
How would you react in the event of a significant decline in your portfolio?
options: I would immediately sell my at-risk investments
I would rapidly reallocate my portfolio
I would monitor changes in my portfolio closely without making any hasty decisions
I would maintain my investments, seeing this decline as a source of opportunity

form.section: Do you wish to take Sustainable Finance criteria into consideration in your investment choices and express your preferences on the way non-financial criteria: environmental (E), social (S) and governance (G) should be taken into account in the management of your assets?
form.content: The Crédit Agricole Indosuez Wealth Management Group wishes to contribute, through its investment solutions, to the transition to a more sustainable and resilient economy, by supporting its clients in their choices with regard to the management of their assets or their energy transition.
